overview:
Loren is the VP of Search Products at Inuvo. Loren has led the Search Products group at Inuvo, an online marketing technology and services company, since 2006. In addition to overseeing product development efforts related to Search for Inuvo, he has established, developed and maintains key partnerships that contribute close to 85% of the company’s overall revenue. Loren joined Inuvo as part of an acquisition of Litmus Media, Inc. where he served as Director of Client Relations.

Prior to Litmus Media and Inuvo, Loren was part of the management team at iModules Software, a SAS technology solution provider started from the purchased remnants of dot-com implosion Planet Alumni, where he led client services and, in true start-up form, handled many responsibilities including sales engineering, product management and support. During his tenure, Loren played a key strategic role in helping to build iModules from fewer than 5 clients to more than 250 with an annual retention rate over 90%.

Loren received a B.S. in Business Administration with a concentration in Advertising from The University of Kansas.

Loren is currently based in Tampa, Florida.
